talk_0021:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Think_01>I recommend you begin by making your
way to the light you see over there.
talk_0022:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>One more thing before you set out on
your journey.
talk_0023:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:WorkHeavy_00>There is something I would like you to
have.<sp:5:0:0> Please speak with my associate
when possible.
talk_0019:
<sp:3:0:2:0801>Thank you for repelling the trespassers.<sp:5:0:0><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>I hope you will pardon me for listening in
on your conversation.<sp:5:0:0>
talk_0020:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:QuestionNormal>That man mentioned an abandoned mine
to the southwest. I suspect that he is
referring to the <clr:0000>former Gerudo Mine<clr:ffff>.
That place flourished with activity long
ago like this one. Ore was constantly
unearthed and refined.
There are <clr:0000>statues that point the way<clr:ffff> to
the Abandoned Gerudo Mine. Follow them
to reach that destination.
